name: RelativePositionedTransition
desc: Animated version of [Positioned] which transitions the child's position based on the value of [rect] relative to a bounding box with the specified [size].

fields.name: size
fields.desc: The [Positioned] widget's offsets are relative to a box of this size whose origin is 0,0.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

nodes.name: Basic Usage of RelativePositionedTransition
desc: PositionedTransition component only works within a Stack
